title: SMC_TRAFOF_Scara3 (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_TRAFOF_Scara3
The transformation module is provided to
execute forward transformations of 3-jointed Scara systems
Note
For detailed information on transformation modules
see overview to
SM_Trafo_POUs
.

rows.Name: dOffsetA
rows.Comment:
Additional offset for axis A in degree
(equivalent toSMC_TRAFO_SCARA3)

rows:

(equivalent toSMC_TRAFO_SCARA3)

Additional offset for axis C in degree
(equivalent toSMC_TRAFO_SCARA3)
Length of robot arm 1 in t.u.
Length of robot arm 2 in t.u.
Length of robot arm 3 in t.u.

Y-Component of manipulator position in geo coordinates
